attributes.action: Make all MP pay back all expenses claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stand as independent MP against your MP looking for re election at the next general election if he or she does not pay their expenses back which they have claimed since the last general election. 
Until this hole mess is sorted out why should we trust any MP with our money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
